options.name: Psychologist
options.description: Gain +1 Behavior and +1 Presence. You can analyze a creature's mental state and emotional responses with a successful check.

options.name: Keen Insight
options.description: Gain +1 Behavior. You can determine if a creature is lying with advantage on your check.

options.name: Calming Presence
options.description: Gain +1 Presence. You can use your action to calm an emotional or distressed creature, reducing their aggression or fear.

options.name: Mental Fortitude
options.description: Gain +1 Behavior and +1 Mental Mitigation. You have advantage on saving throws against mind-affecting abilities.

options.name: Action : Psychological Manipulation
options.description: Target a creature that can understand you and make a Behavior check against their Resistance. If successful, you can influence their emotional state, making them friendly, fearful, or confused for 1 minute.

options.name: Reaction : Emotional Support
options.description: When an ally within 30 feet fails a save against a fear, charm, or confusion effect, you can use your reaction to grant them a reroll with advantage.

options.name: Trauma Counseling
options.description: Gain +1 Behavior and +1 Medicine. You can remove mental conditions like fear, confusion, or madness after spending 10 minutes with a creature.

options.name: Action : Break Will
options.description: Target a creature and make a contested Behavior check against their Resistance. If successful, the target becomes susceptible to suggestion and will truthfully answer one question.

options.name: Mental Shield
options.description: Gain +1 Mental Mitigation and immunity to being charmed or frightened. You can extend this immunity to one ally within 30 feet as a bonus action.

options.name: Master Psychologist
options.description: Gain +1 Behavior and +1 Presence. You can read and influence the thoughts of creatures within 30 feet. Once per day, you can implant a suggestion that the target believes is their own idea.
